name: BD Headphones Hub
intro1: ■ Single page React web application which is focused on a Niche website (single product category selling website)
intro2: ■ Fully responsive . User , admin both can be able to interact.
intro3: ■ Customers can create accounts , login ,buy products,review etc .Beside admin has full access with database .
techno: Javascript , React, Bootstrap, ExpressJS, Heroku deploy, firebase, React router, Node, Mongodb

name: BD-China Travel Service
intro1: ■ Website purpose is to provide A-Z guidance to travel China from Bangladesh.
intro2: ■ Firebase authentication If a user is logged in, he/she will see more options like My Orders, Manage All Orders.
intro3: ■ Stored user information in mongodb database .
techno: Javascript , React, Bootstrap,ExpressJS,Heroku deploy, firebase, React router, Node, Mongodb
